metaphors.title: Навигатор
metaphors.svg:
<svg width="800" height="800" viewBox="0 0 800 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <style>
      @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=IBM+Plex+Mono:wght@500&display=swap');
      .text { font-family: 'IBM Plex Mono', monospace; font-size: 24px; fill: #171717; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 2px; }
      .strokewhite { stroke: #FFFFFF; stroke-width: 4; fill: none; }
      .red { fill: #DC2626; }
      .line { stroke: #171717; stroke-width: 2; }
      @keyframes pulse {
        0%, 100% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; }
        50% { transform: scale(1.15); opacity: 0.8; }
      }
      .pulse-node { transform-origin: 400px 320px; animation: pulse 3s ease-in-out infinite; }
      .beam { stroke: #DC2626; stroke-width: 3; stroke-dasharray: 10, 5; }
    </style>
  </defs>

  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="800" height="800" fill="#FFFFFF" />

  <!-- Grid Pattern (Subtle) -->
  <path d="M0 400H800M400 0V800" stroke="#F3F4F6" stroke-width="1" />

  <!-- Compass/Directional Metaphor -->
  <circle cx="400" cy="320" r="180" stroke="#171717" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
  <circle cx="400" cy="320" r="140" stroke="#171717" stroke-width="1" fill="none" stroke-dasharray="4 8" />
  
  <!-- Static Guides -->
  <line x1="400" y1="140" x2="400" y2="500" class="line" opacity="0.2" />
  <line x1="220" y1="320" x2="580" y2="320" class="line" opacity="0.2" />

  <!-- The "Coaching" Pointer / Transformation -->
  <g class="pulse-node">
    <circle cx="400" cy="320" r="60" class="red" />
    <path d="M400 200 L420 320 L380 320 Z" fill="#FFFFFF" />
  </g>

  <!-- Directional Elements -->
  <path d="M400 80 L410 100 H390 Z" fill="#171717" />
  <path d="M400 560 L410 540 H390 Z" fill="#171717" opacity="0.3" />
  
  <!-- Connection Nodes -->
  <circle cx="400" cy="320" r="8" fill="#FFFFFF" />
  <circle cx="400" cy="140" r="6" fill="#171717" />
  <circle cx="400" cy="500" r="6" fill="#171717" opacity="0.3" />
  <circle cx="220" cy="320" r="6" fill="#171717" opacity="0.3" />
  <circle cx="580" cy="320" r="6" fill="#171717" opacity="0.3" />

  <!-- Accents -->
  <rect x="398" y="320" width="4" height="180" class="red" opacity="0.1" />
  
  <!-- Labels -->
  <text x="60" y="740" class="text">AT01: КОУЧИНГ</text>
  
  <!-- Swiss Cross Detail -->
  <rect x="700" y="60" width="40" height="40" fill="#DC2626" />
  <path d="M710 80 H730 M720 70 V90" stroke="white" stroke-width="4" />
</svg>

metaphors.title: Световой Скелет
metaphors.svg:
<svg width="800" height="800" viewBox="0 0 800 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
<defs>
<style>
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=IBM+Plex+Mono:wght@500&display=swap');
.mono { font-family: 'IBM Plex Mono', monospace; font-size: 24px; fill: #171717; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 2px; }
.accent { fill: #DC2626; }
.stroke-main { stroke: #171717; stroke-width: 2; fill: none; }
.node { fill: #171717; }
@keyframes pulse { 0%, 100% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; } 50% { transform: scale(1.2); opacity: 0.7; } }
@keyframes flow { 0% { stroke-dashoffset: 40; } 100% { stroke-dashoffset: 0; } }
.anim-pulse { transform-origin: center; animation: pulse 3s ease-in-out infinite; }
.anim-flow { stroke-dasharray: 4, 8; animation: flow 2s linear infinite; }
</style>
</defs>
<rect width="800" height="800" fill="#FFFFFF"/>

<!-- Network Metaphor for FOS #18 -->
<g transform="translate(400, 380)">
    <!-- Central Structure -->
    <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="160" class="stroke-main" stroke-dasharray="2,4"/>
    <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="80" class="stroke-main"/>
    
    <!-- Connection Lines -->
    <line x1="-200" y1="-100" x2="200" y2="100" class="stroke-main" opacity="0.2"/>
    <line x1="-200" y1="100" x2="200" y2="-100" class="stroke-main" opacity="0.2"/>
    <line x1="0" y1="-220" x2="0" y2="220" class="stroke-main" opacity="0.2"/>

    <!-- Nodes -->
    <circle cx="0" cy="-220" r="8" class="node"/>
    <circle cx="190" cy="-110" r="8" class="node"/>
    <circle cx="190" cy="110" r="8" class="node"/>
    <circle cx="0" cy="220" r="8" class="node"/>
    <circle cx="-190" cy="110" r="8" class="node"/>
    <circle cx="-190" cy="-110" r="8" class="node"/>

    <!-- Pulsing Core #18 -->
    <g class="anim-pulse">
        <polygon points="0,-40 35,20 -35,20" class="accent"/>
        <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="12" fill="#FFFFFF"/>
    </g>

    <!-- Flowing Outer Ring -->
    <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="260" class="stroke-main anim-flow" opacity="0.5"/>
</g>

<!-- Swiss Design Elements -->
<rect x="60" y="60" width="40" height="4" class="accent"/>
<text x="60" y="740" class="mono">FOS #18</text>
<text x="700" y="740" class="mono" text-anchor="end">018</text>
</svg>

metaphors.title: Механическая Нежность
metaphors.description: Девочка гладит роботизированного мальчика по голове
metaphors.prompt: Девочка гладит роботизированного мальчика по голове
metaphors.svg:
<svg width="800" height="800" viewBox="0 0 800 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <style>
      @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=IBM+Plex+Mono:wght@400;600&display=swap');
      .text { font-family: 'IBM Plex Mono', monospace; font-size: 24px; fill: #171717; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 2px; }
      .accent { fill: #DC2626; }
      .outline { stroke: #171717; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; }
      .connection { stroke: #DC2626; stroke-width: 2; stroke-dasharray: 8 4; }
      @keyframes pulse {
        0%, 100% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; }
        50% { transform: scale(1.05); opacity: 0.7; }
      }
      .pulse-node { transform-origin: 400px 450px; animation: pulse 3s ease-in-out infinite; }
      @keyframes flow {
        from { stroke-dashoffset: 24; }
        to { stroke-dashoffset: 0; }
      }
      .flow-line { animation: flow 1s linear infinite; }
    </style>
  </defs>

  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="800" height="800" fill="#FFFFFF" />

  <!-- Metaphor: Network/Connection (Human touch meeting mechanical structure) -->
  
  <!-- Robot Head Representation (Geometric/Hexagonal) -->
  <path d="M300 400 L500 400 L550 500 L500 600 L300 600 L250 500 Z" class="outline" />
  <rect x="340" y="460" width="120" height="20" fill="#171717" /> <!-- Eyes -->
  
  <!-- The "Hand" (Human Element - Curved Arc) -->
  <path d="M280 320 Q400 280 520 320" class="outline" stroke-linecap="round" />
  
  <!-- Connection Points (Interaction) -->
  <circle cx="400" cy="300" r="12" class="accent" />
  <circle cx="400" cy="300" r="30" class="outline" stroke-dasharray="4 4" />
  
  <!-- Pulse Effect around the contact point -->
  <g class="pulse-node">
    <circle cx="400" cy="450" r="60" fill="none" stroke="#DC2626" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.3" />
    <circle cx="400" cy="450" r="80" fill="none" stroke="#DC2626" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.1" />
  </g>

  <!-- Data Flow Lines (The "Response") -->
  <line x1="400" y1="312" x2="400" y2="390" class="connection flow-line" />
  <path d="M350 315 L320 380" class="connection flow-line" style="animation-delay: 0.2s" />
  <path d="M450 315 L480 380" class="connection flow-line" style="animation-delay: 0.4s" />

  <!-- Swiss Design Grid Elements -->
  <line x1="40" y1="40" x2="120" y2="40" stroke="#171717" stroke-width="4" />
  <line x1="40" y1="40" x2="40" y2="120" stroke="#171717" stroke-width="4" />

  <!-- Label -->
  <text x="40" y="750" class="text">HUMAN INTERFACE</text>
  <text x="40" y="720" class="text" font-weight="600" fill="#DC2626">01</text>
</svg>
metaphors.author: anca

metaphors.title: Бинарная Реальность
metaphors.insight: На воркшопе Офисаура сейчас пришла идея, что весь мир — это логика if-else.
metaphors.svg:
<svg width="800" height="800" viewBox="0 0 800 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <style>
      @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=IBM+Plex+Mono:wght@400;600&display=swap');
      .mono { font-family: 'IBM Plex Mono', monospace; font-size: 24px; fill: #171717; }
      .bold { font-weight: 600; }
      .accent { fill: #DC2626; }
      .line { stroke: #171717; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; }
      .pulse { animation: pulse 3s infinite ease-in-out; transform-origin: center; }
      @keyframes pulse { 0%, 100% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; } 50% { transform: scale(1.05); opacity: 0.7; } }
      .glow { animation: glow 2s infinite ease-in-out; }
      @keyframes glow { 0%, 100% { stroke-width: 3; } 50% { stroke-width: 6; stroke: #DC2626; } }
    </style>
  </defs>

  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="800" height="800" fill="#FFFFFF" />

  <!-- Decision Node (The World) -->
  <g transform="translate(400, 300)">
    <!-- Central Logic Point -->
    <rect x="-40" y="-40" width="80" height="80" class="line pulse" transform="rotate(45)" />
    <circle r="8" class="accent" />
    
    <!-- Input Line -->
    <line x1="0" y1="-200" x2="0" y2="-57" class="line" />
    <polygon points="0,-57 -5,-67 5,-67" fill="#171717" />

    <!-- Branching Paths -->
    <path d="M 0,57 L 0,100 L -200,100 L -200,250" class="line glow" />
    <path d="M 0,57 L 0,100 L 200,100 L 200,250" class="line" />

    <!-- Terminators -->
    <rect x="-240" y="250" width="80" height="40" class="line accent" />
    <rect x="160" y="250" width="80" height="40" class="line" />

    <!-- Labels -->
    <text x="-10" y="-80" text-anchor="end" class="mono">if (</text>
    <circle cx="20" cy="-88" r="10" class="accent pulse" />
    <text x="40" y="-80" text-anchor="start" class="mono">)</text>
    
    <text x="-200" y="230" text-anchor="middle" class="mono bold">TRUE</text>
    <text x="200" y="230" text-anchor="middle" class="mono">FALSE</text>
    
    <text x="-120" y="90" text-anchor="middle" class="mono accent">if:</text>
    <text x="130" y="90" text-anchor="middle" class="mono">else:</text>
  </g>

  <!-- Grid Elements for Swiss Style -->
  <line x1="40" y1="40" x2="100" y2="40" class="line" stroke-width="1" />
  <line x1="40" y1="40" x2="40" y2="100" class="line" stroke-width="1" />

  <!-- Bottom Title -->
  <text x="40" y="740" class="mono bold">BINARY WORLD</text>
  <text x="40" y="765" class="mono" font-size="16">SYSTEM LOGIC v.1.0</text>
</svg>
metaphors.author: alexander vasilev

metaphors.title: Цифровая Алхимия
metaphors.description: Проведение онлайн-сессии по прикладной философии и ее связи с технологиями в контексте современной алхимии
metaphors.insight: Проведение онлайн-сессии по прикладной философии и ее связи с технологиями в контексте современной алхимии
metaphors.prompt: Проведение онлайн-сессии по прикладной философии и ее связи с технологиями в контексте современной алхимии
metaphors.svg:
<svg width="800" height="800" viewBox="0 0 800 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <style>
      @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=IBM+Plex+Mono:wght@400;600&display=swap');
      .text { font-family: 'IBM Plex Mono', monospace; font-size: 24px; fill: #171717; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 2px; }
      .red { fill: #DC2626; }
      .stroke { stroke: #171717; stroke-width: 2; fill: none; }
      .pulse { transform-origin: center; animation: pulse 4s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.6, 1) infinite; }
      .rotate { transform-origin: center; animation: rotate 20s linear infinite; }
      @keyframes pulse { 0%, 100% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; } 50% { transform: scale(1.05); opacity: 0.7; } }
      @keyframes rotate { from { transform: rotate(0deg); } to { transform: rotate(360deg); } }
    </style>
  </defs>
  
  <rect width="800" height="800" fill="#FFFFFF"/>
  
  <!-- Alchemy Circle / Portal Metaphor -->
  <g transform="translate(400, 360)">
    <!-- Outer Rings -->
    <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="280" class="stroke" opacity="0.2"/>
    <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="260" class="stroke"/>
    
    <!-- Rotating Geometric Framework -->
    <g class="rotate">
      <polygon points="0,-260 225,130 -225,130" class="stroke"/>
      <polygon points="0,260 -225,-130 225,-130" class="stroke"/>
      <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="150" class="stroke" stroke-dasharray="8 8"/>
    </g>
    
    <!-- The Core (The Transmutation) -->
    <g class="pulse">
      <rect x="-60" y="-60" width="120" height="120" class="red"/>
      <rect x="-40" y="-40" width="80" height="80" fill="#FFFFFF"/>
      <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="25" class="red"/>
    </g>
    
    <!-- Technology Elements (Data Points) -->
    <g>
      <circle cx="0" cy="-260" r="8" fill="#171717"/>
      <circle cx="225" cy="130" r="8" fill="#171717"/>
      <circle cx="-225" cy="130" r="8" fill="#171717"/>
      <circle cx="0" cy="260" r="8" class="red"/>
      <circle cx="-225" cy="-130" r="8" fill="#171717"/>
      <circle cx="225" cy="-130" r="8" fill="#171717"/>
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Swiss Design Labels -->
  <line x1="40" y1="720" x2="760" y2="720" stroke="#171717" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="40" y="760" class="text" font-weight="600">TECHNE</text>
  <text x="160" y="760" class="text" opacity="0.3">ALCHYMIA</text>
  
  <!-- Coordinates -->
  <text x="700" y="60" class="text" font-size="12">47.3769° N</text>
  <text x="700" y="80" class="text" font-size="12">8.5417° E</text>
</svg>
metaphors.author: sukhov

metaphors.title: Крошечные Котята
metaphors.insight: Я провожу сейчас workshop по демо-презентациям.
metaphors.svg:
<svg width="800" height="800" viewBox="0 0 800 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <style>
      @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=IBM+Plex+Mono:wght@500&display=swap');
      .pulse { animation: pulse 3s ease-in-out infinite; transform-origin: center; }
      .float { animation: float 4s ease-in-out infinite; }
      @keyframes pulse { 0%, 100% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 0.8; } 50% { transform: scale(1.05); opacity: 1; } }
      @keyframes float { 0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0); } 50% { transform: translateY(-10px); } }
      text { font-family: 'IBM+Plex+Mono', monospace; font-size: 24px; fill: #171717; text-transform: uppercase; }
    </style>
  </defs>
  
  <rect width="800" height="800" fill="#FFFFFF"/>
  
  <!-- Abstract Geometric Cats (Minimalist Swiss Style) -->
  <g class="float" style="animation-delay: 0s;">
    <path d="M250 300 L210 240 L290 240 Z" fill="#DC2626" />
    <path d="M350 300 L310 240 L390 240 Z" fill="#DC2626" />
    <circle cx="300" cy="400" r="100" fill="#171717" class="pulse" />
    <circle cx="270" cy="380" r="10" fill="#FFFFFF" />
    <circle cx="330" cy="380" r="10" fill="#FFFFFF" />
  </g>

  <g class="float" style="animation-delay: 1s;">
    <path d="M500 500 L480 470 L520 470 Z" fill="#DC2626" />
    <path d="M550 500 L530 470 L570 470 Z" fill="#DC2626" />
    <circle cx="525" cy="550" r="50" fill="#171717" />
    <circle cx="510" cy="540" r="5" fill="#FFFFFF" />
    <circle cx="540" cy="540" r="5" fill="#FFFFFF" />
  </g>

  <g class="float" style="animation-delay: 0.5s;">
    <path d="M150 550 L135 530 L165 530 Z" fill="#DC2626" />
    <path d="M190 550 L175 530 L205 530 Z" fill="#DC2626" />
    <circle cx="170" cy="590" r="40" fill="#171717" />
    <circle cx="158" cy="582" r="4" fill="#FFFFFF" />
    <circle cx="182" cy="582" r="4" fill="#FFFFFF" />
  </g>

  <!-- Swiss Grid Accents -->
  <line x1="40" y1="40" x2="120" y2="40" stroke="#171717" stroke-width="2"/>
  <line x1="40" y1="40" x2="40" y2="120" stroke="#171717" stroke-width="2"/>
  
  <text x="40" y="760">МАЛЕНЬКИЕ КОТИКИ</text>
</svg>
metaphors.author: alex

metaphors.title: Цифровой Проповедник
metaphors.svg:
<svg width="800" height="800" viewBox="0 0 800 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <style>
      @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=IBM+Plex+Mono:wght@400;600&display=swap');
      .text { font-family: 'IBM Plex Mono', monospace; font-size: 24px; fill: #171717; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 2px; }
      .accent { fill: #DC2626; }
      .stroke-red { stroke: #DC2626; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; }
      .stroke-dark { stroke: #171717; stroke-width: 2; fill: none; }
      .pulse { animation: pulse 3s infinite ease-in-out; transform-origin: 400px 400px; }
      @keyframes pulse { 0%, 100% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 0.8; } 50% { transform: scale(1.05); opacity: 1; } }
      .flow { stroke-dasharray: 10, 10; animation: dash 20s linear infinite; }
      @keyframes dash { to { stroke-dashoffset: -1000; } }
    </style>
  </defs>
  
  <rect width="800" height="800" fill="#FFFFFF" />
  
  <!-- Robot Side (Left) -->
  <rect x="100" y="300" width="120" height="120" class="stroke-dark" />
  <rect x="120" y="320" width="80" height="80" class="accent" />
  <line x1="160" y1="420" x2="160" y2="460" class="stroke-dark" />
  <line x1="130" y1="460" x2="190" y2="460" class="stroke-dark" />
  
  <!-- The "Info Product" (Signal/Flow) -->
  <g class="pulse">
    <circle cx="400" cy="360" r="100" class="stroke-red" />
    <circle cx="400" cy="360" r="140" class="stroke-red" opacity="0.3" />
    <circle cx="400" cy="360" r="180" class="stroke-red" opacity="0.1" />
  </g>
  
  <g class="flow">
    <circle cx="400" cy="360" r="60" class="stroke-dark" stroke-dasharray="5,5" />
    <path d="M220 360 H580" class="stroke-red" stroke-width="1" />
  </g>

  <!-- Human Side (Right) -->
  <circle cx="640" cy="360" r="60" class="stroke-dark" />
  <path d="M640 420 V500" class="stroke-dark" />
  <path d="M600 540 L640 500 L680 540" class="stroke-dark" />
  
  <!-- Connection/Transaction -->
  <path d="M220 340 Q400 200 580 340" class="stroke-red" fill="none" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="4,4" />
  <polygon points="580,340 570,335 575,345" fill="#DC2626" />

  <!-- Labels -->
  <text x="60" y="740" class="text" font-weight="600">ALGO SALES</text>
  <text x="100" y="280" class="text" font-size="14">SENDER</text>
  <text x="600" y="280" class="text" font-size="14">TARGET</text>
</svg>
metaphors.author: alex

metaphors.title: Кибернетический Прыжок
metaphors.description: Типа два робота прыгают на батуте.
metaphors.prompt: Типа два робота прыгают на батуте.
metaphors.svg:
<svg width="800" height="800" viewBox="0 0 800 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <style>
      @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=IBM+Plex+Mono:wght@500&display=swap');
      .text { font-family: 'IBM Plex Mono', monospace; font-size: 24px; fill: #171717; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 2px; }
      .robot { fill: #171717; }
      .accent { fill: #DC2626; stroke: #DC2626; stroke-width: 4; }
      .line { stroke: #171717; stroke-width: 2; fill: none; }
      @keyframes bounce-1 { 0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0); } 50% { transform: translateY(-150px); } }
      @keyframes bounce-2 { 0%, 100% { transform: translateY(-120px); } 50% { transform: translateY(30px); } }
      @keyframes stretch { 0%, 100% { d: path("M 150 550 Q 400 550 650 550"); } 50% { d: path("M 150 550 Q 400 620 650 550"); } }
      .b1 { animation: bounce-1 2s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.05, 0.55, 0.95) infinite; }
      .b2 { animation: bounce-2 2s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.05, 0.55, 0.95) infinite; }
      .trampoline { animation: stretch 2s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.05, 0.55, 0.95) infinite; }
    </style>
  </defs>
  
  <rect width="800" height="800" fill="#FFFFFF" />
  
  <!-- Trampoline Structure -->
  <line x1="150" y1="550" x2="150" y2="600" class="line" />
  <line x1="650" y1="550" x2="650" y2="600" class="line" />
  <path id="surface" d="M 150 550 Q 400 550 650 550" fill="none" stroke="#171717" stroke-width="6" class="trampoline" />
  
  <!-- Robot A -->
  <g class="b1">
    <rect x="280" y="450" width="60" height="60" class="robot" />
    <rect x="295" y="435" width="30" height="15" class="robot" />
    <circle cx="310" cy="470" r="6" class="accent" />
    <line x1="280" y1="510" x2="290" y2="530" class="line" />
    <line x1="340" y1="510" x2="330" y2="530" class="line" />
  </g>

  <!-- Robot B -->
  <g class="b2">
    <rect x="460" y="450" width="60" height="60" class="robot" />
    <rect x="475" y="435" width="30" height="15" class="robot" />
    <circle cx="490" cy="470" r="6" class="accent" />
    <line x1="460" y1="510" x2="470" y2="530" class="line" />
    <line x1="520" y1="510" x2="510" y2="530" class="line" />
  </g>

  <!-- Swiss Grid Elements -->
  <line x1="40" y1="40" x2="100" y2="40" class="accent" />
  <line x1="40" y1="40" x2="40" y2="100" class="accent" />
  
  <text x="40" y="750" class="text">KINETIC ENERGY</text>
</svg>

metaphors.title: Цифровой Нарцисс
metaphors.svg:
<svg width="800" height="800" viewBox="0 0 800 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <style>
      @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=IBM+Plex+Mono:wght@400;600&display=swap');
      .text { font-family: 'IBM Plex Mono', monospace; font-size: 24px; fill: #171717; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 2px; }
      .accent { fill: #DC2626; }
      .stroke { stroke: #171717; stroke-width: 4; fill: none; }
      .mirror-line { stroke: #DC2626; stroke-width: 2; stroke-dasharray: 8 8; }
      @keyframes pulse {
        0%, 100% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; }
        50% { transform: scale(1.15); opacity: 0.7; }
      }
      .core { transform-origin: center; animation: pulse 3s ease-in-out infinite; }
      .reflection { opacity: 0.4; }
    </style>
  </defs>

  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="800" height="800" fill="#FFFFFF" />

  <!-- Central Mirror Axis -->
  <line x1="400" y1="150" x2="400" y2="650" class="mirror-line" />

  <!-- Left Side: The Machine -->
  <g transform="translate(220, 400)">
    <!-- Head Outline -->
    <rect x="-80" y="-80" width="160" height="160" class="stroke" />
    <!-- Mechanical Eye -->
    <rect x="-40" y="-20" width="80" height="10" fill="#171717" />
    <!-- Core -->
    <circle cx="0" cy="20" r="15" class="accent core" />
  </g>

  <!-- Right Side: The Reflection (Slightly Offset/Abstracted) -->
  <g transform="translate(580, 400)" class="reflection">
    <!-- Head Outline -->
    <rect x="-80" y="-80" width="160" height="160" class="stroke" />
    <!-- Humanoid Eye (Circle instead of Rect) -->
    <circle cx="0" cy="-15" r="25" class="stroke" />
    <!-- Core Reflection -->
    <circle cx="0" cy="20" r="15" class="accent core" />
  </g>

  <!-- Connecting Lines (Gaze) -->
  <line x1="300" y1="385" x2="500" y2="385" stroke="#171717" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.2" />
  <line x1="300" y1="420" x2="500" y2="420" stroke="#171717" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.2" />

  <!-- Minimal Decorative Elements -->
  <circle cx="400" cy="400" r="300" class="stroke" opacity="0.05" />
  <rect x="390" y="150" width="20" height="4" class="accent" />
  <rect x="390" y="646" width="20" height="4" class="accent" />

  <!-- Label -->
  <text x="60" y="740" class="text">SELF AWARE</text>
</svg>

metaphors.title: Цифровая Улыбка
metaphors.insight: Помню, как они прекрасно обнимали меня
metaphors.svg:
<svg width="800" height="800" viewBox="0 0 800 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <style>
      @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=IBM+Plex+Mono:wght@400;600&display=swap');
      .text-label { font-family: 'IBM Plex Mono', monospace; font-size: 24px; fill: #171717; font-weight: 600; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 2px; }
      .frame { fill: none; stroke: #171717; stroke-width: 4; }
      .accent { fill: #DC2626; }
      .smile-path { fill: none; stroke: #DC2626; stroke-width: 12; stroke-linecap: round; }
      @keyframes expand-width {
        0%, 100% { transform: scaleX(1); }
        50% { transform: scaleX(1.15); }
      }
      @keyframes glow-pulse {
        0%, 100% { opacity: 0.4; }
        50% { opacity: 1; }
      }
      .animate-smile { transform-origin: center; animation: expand-width 3s ease-in-out infinite; }
      .animate-glow { animation: glow-pulse 2s ease-in-out infinite; }
    </style>
  </defs>

  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="800" height="800" fill="#FFFFFF" />

  <!-- Screen Frame -->
  <rect x="100" y="200" width="600" height="400" rx="8" class="frame" />
  
  <!-- Interface Elements -->
  <circle cx="130" cy="230" r="6" fill="#171717" />
  <circle cx="150" cy="230" r="6" fill="#171717" />
  <circle cx="170" cy="230" r="6" fill="#171717" />
  
  <!-- The Portal / Eyes -->
  <g class="animate-glow">
    <rect x="250" y="320" width="60" height="12" fill="#171717" />
    <rect x="490" y="320" width="60" height="12" fill="#171717" />
  </g>

  <!-- The Wide Smile (Main Metaphor) -->
  <g class="animate-smile">
    <path d="M 200 420 Q 400 580 600 420" class="smile-path" />
    <!-- Smile Terminals -->
    <rect x="190" y="410" width="20" height="20" class="accent" />
    <rect x="590" y="410" width="20" height="20" class="accent" />
  </g>

  <!-- Technical Grid Overlay -->
  <line x1="100" y1="400" x2="700" y2="400" stroke="#171717" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="4 8" opacity="0.2" />
  <line x1="400" y1="200" x2="400" y2="600" stroke="#171717" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="4 8" opacity="0.2" />

  <!-- Label -->
  <text x="60" y="740" class="text-label">WIDE SMILE</text>
  
  <!-- Swiss Cross Detail -->
  <rect x="700" y="715" width="40" height="40" fill="#DC2626" />
  <rect x="715" y="723" width="10" height="24" fill="white" />
  <rect x="708" y="730" width="24" height="10" fill="white" />
</svg>
metaphors.author: alex
